attributes.action: Stop holiday companies and hotels charging more in the school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Holiday companies and hotels often double the price of flights or complete holidays during the school holidays stopping many families from getting a well earned break. Why not get your point across once and for all this year sign up to ensure that your next family holiday is up to 50% cheaper. Getting a standardised price will also ensure that the holiday companies sell more holidays so everyone wins.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
